Home Libraries People FAQ More
test::basic_stream::~basic_stream

Destructor.

Synopsis 
~basic_stream();
Description

If an asynchronous read operation is pending, it will simply be discarded with no notification to the completion handler. If a connection is established while the stream is destroyed, the peer will see the error net::error::connection_reset when performing any reads or writes.
